about_the_game:
Customers... Don't let them find out... Rip-off! A thrilling rip-off adventure where if the customers find out, you'll explode!

[game description]
This is an adventure game where you play the role of a cab driver and try to rip off your customers without getting caught. Try to rip off as many customers as possible by making better conversation responses and road choices!

[story]
The town of Makuri-cho (ボッタ栗市マ栗町) was infested with evil cab drivers, and rip-offs were rampant.
As a countermeasure, the mayor has come up with a... Explosion!
Some amazing technology, so that when it detects a customer's anger, it explodes. This has drastically reduced the number of rip-off cabs. They were reborn as peaceful cabs!

However, there were still those who persisted in ripping off customers.

Yes, it is you.
